ai-thi-ap12:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
ai-thi-ap12:1.4_0: walking-paths in the path of the walking sticks.
ai-thi-ap12:2.3_0: Today you’ll understand the great hero,
ai-thi-ap12:3.2_0: He has crossed over the world.
ai-thi-ap12:3.3_0: Today you’ll understand the great hero,
ai-thi-ap12:4.1_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
ai-thi-ap12:4.2_0: I paid homage to the best of two,
ai-thi-ap12:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-thi-ap12:6.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-thi-ap12:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-thi-ap12:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Māraḷivisa.
ai-thi-ap12:10.1_0: to the elder flowers of the senior monks.
